lom:description.lom:string: Computer Science was formally instituted as a major at Harvey Mudd College in the Spring of 1992. Currently the total number of HMC majors in Computer Science in their sophomore, junior, and senior years is about 75. Additionally, we provide for students in the HMC Joint CS/Math major (currently about 25 students) and students from the other Claremont Colleges.

lom:title.lom:string: Undergraduate Computer Science Curriculum - Harvey Mudd College
